titleStmt.title: The history of the war of Cyprus. Written originally in Latin. With a new map of the island.
De bello Cyprio. English
titleStmt.author: Graziani, Antonio Maria, 1537-1611.
Midgley, Robert, 1655?-1723.
Lusignano, Stefano, 1537-1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Rawlins and sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Translation by Robert Midgley of: De bello Cyprio. Cf. DNB.
Attributed to Antonio Maria Graziani; previously also attributed to S. Lusignano. Cf. DNB; NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
Item at reel 389:13 imperfect: signature Cc2 has print missing in filmed copy. Pages 360-end of book photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at the end.
